channel.title: DockerCompose on Alejandro Inglés Martínez
channel.description: Recent content in DockerCompose on Alejandro Inglés Martínez

item.title: Deployment of multi-container service
item.description:
This project was developed for the Containers subject as part of the official university master’s degree in Development and Operations (DevOps). The main objective of this project is to deploy a multi-tier application built on top of several containers orchestrated and deployed using Docker compose technology. The deployment is based on and is a continuation of the project “Dockerisation of multi-tier application” already uploaded to this portfolio. GitHub repository: https://github.com/aleingmar/multi-layer-app-dockercompose

Project report:

Project documentation: View documentation in pdf
